result.reason: Leveraging the native Windows OpenSSH client reduces reliance on third-party tools (PuTTY) and aligns with modern Windows capabilities.
result.approach: Create a new protocol handler that interfaces with the native ssh.exe, likely requiring a terminal emulation wrapper to embed the console output into an mRemoteNG tab.
